Reviews.Title: this is a lot better then a cell phone
Reviews.Author: msch5609
Reviews.Content: cause been checking around for this and comes in handy instead of cell phone i keep droping itthe cell phone all the time but with the watch i always check the time and i just sent this item back cause will not charge or come oni do have the tracking number from post office and want the same one sent to me 9114901159818227789369 this here is the tracking numberand i really love this item a lot

ProductInfo.Features:
Built in Bluetooth technology and FM radio
1.3 inch display GSM (850/900/1800/1900MHz)
CPU MTK6253 Internal Memory 128MB
Stand-by time Up To 200 hours/Talk time Up To 3 hours
Languages English, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Turkish, Nepali, Chinese
ProductInfo.Name: Koolertron® Unlocked 1.3 Inch GSM Quad-band Watch Mobile Phone With Camera Bluetooth FM GPRS 4GB TF Card
